name: Template Review meta-plan
description: Minimal meta-plan structure for reviewing templates and registry alignment.
workstreams: Clarify goals, constraints, and success criteria for template review.
Inventory existing templates and surfaces where they are consumed.
Identify dependencies (registry, workflows, approval points) and required inputs.
List unknowns and operator questions blocking planning or execution.
Define acceptance checks to determine meta-plan completeness.
acceptance: meta-plan outlines workstreams, dependencies, and unknowns specific to the request.
Placeholders are replaced and saved under plans/plan-{2-byte-id}-{very-nice-five-word-slug}.md.
Operator review is requested and recorded before proceeding to planning.
usage_steps: Copy this template when preparing a meta-plan for template reviews or registry work.
Fill placeholders (id, slug, title, owner) to match the current effort.
Draft the meta-plan using the workstreams and acceptance checks above.
Request operator approval before moving on to detailed planning.
